Detailed Description

Abstract class used in MVC pattern. This class represents the interface for observers, in this case the GUI.

virtual void ViewInterface::update ( int  _mode,
cv::Mat &  _view,
int  _frameElapsed 
) [pure virtual]

This method is a part of "Observer pattern", it represents the observer. Basically, this observer update the screen.

Parameters:
_mode Current Mode of operation of calibration.
_view Target Frame used in some operation.
_frameElapsed Number of frames computed.

Implemented in CameraView.
